original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 322.50/323.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 322.50/323.00 to the US dollar on Thursday from 322.60/90 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026, was quoted at 13.85/95 percent from 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 14.10/30 percent from 13.90/14.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 was quoted at 14.05/15 percent from 14.10/20 percent.
The CSE opened down; The All Share Price Index was down 0.13 percent at 10,701, and the S&P SL20 was down 0.16 percent at 3,088. (Colombo/Jan4/2024)
